effects.name: kopaka-ban
effects.text: Play this ability while Kopaka is online: send Kopaka offline, ban an online kuski you control from the game, ban an online kuski your opponent controls from the game.

effects.name: battler
effects.italicText: Battlers cannot add levels to the queue.

effects.name: grob-orka
effects.text: Grob enters the game with 6 orka counters on it. At the beginning of your turn, remove one orka counter from Grob. If Grob has no more orka counters on it, discard it.

effects.name: pipe-pro-10
effects.text: Pipe pro -10
effects.italicText: Decrease this kuski's PRs by 10 seconds on pipe levels.

effects.name: first-finish
effects.text: First Finish
effects.italicText: Kuski times are calculated as kuski's first finish plus 1 minute per full turn already battled.

effects.name: force-play
effects.text: All online kuskis that can enter this level must enter it.

effects.name: pre-announced
effects.text: Pre-announced
effects.italicText: This level can be added in any position of the queue.

effects.name: pab-rookie
effects.text: Pab enters the game online and does not go offline after playing a battle.

effects.name: jblaze-rookie
effects.text: Jblaze always finishes levels with first finish in second place, unless he is the only kuski that played the level.

effects.name: cannot-uphill
effects.text: Cannot play uphill levels.

effects.name: watchful
effects.text: Watchful
effects.italicText: This kuski can enter a pre-announced battle while being offline.

effects.name: markku-apple
effects.text: Whenever an apple level is added to the queue, add an apple counter to Markku.

effects.name: internal-pro-5
effects.text: Internal pro -5
effects.italicText: Decrease this kuski's PRs by 5 seconds on internal levels.

effects.name: multiplayer-pro-2
effects.text: Multiplayer pro -2
effects.italicText: Decrease this kuski's PRs and it's team player by 2 seconds on multiplayer levels.

effects.name: pab-multiplayer
effects.text: Pab can play it's own multiplayer levels. If Pab plays his own level, ban him from the game after the battle ends.

effects.name: markku-limits
effects.text: Markku can only play internal levels or levels with first finish, apple or pre-announced.

effects.name: z-spin-pro-10
effects.text: Z-spin pro 10
effects.italicText: Decrease this kuski's PRs by 10 seconds on levels with zpin shortcut.

effects.name: z-spin-shortcut
effects.text: Z-spin shortcut.

effects.name: rage-quit
effects.text: Target kuski gains: "Whenever this kuski loses in a battle, discard it."

effects.name: long-battle-stop
effects.text: Stop the ongoing battle if it was already played for 2 full turns or more. This effect plays as if the battle ended normally.

effects.name: queue-abort
effects.text: Abort a level from the queue. The kuski that started that level may add a new level to the queue.

effects.name: lucky-first-try
effects.text: Target kuski improves its first PR time by 3 seconds.

effects.name: wheel-pop
effects.text: Target kuski improves its current PR by 2 seconds.

effects.name: lucky-ride
effects.text: Target kuski improves its current PR by 1 second for each full turn already battled by it.

effects.name: disconnect
effects.text: Send offline the target online kuski.

effects.name: battler-block
effects.text: Target kuski becomes a battler in addition to it's other types.

effects.name: designer-block
effects.text: Target kuski becomes a designer in addition to it's other types.

effects.name: designer
effects.italicText: Designers cannot play battles.

effects.name: uphill-pro-10
effects.text: Uphill pro -10
effects.italicText: Decrease this kuski's PRs by 10 seconds on uphill levels.

effects.name: nekit-limits
effects.text: If Nekit stays online for 2 turns without playing a battle, ban Nekit from the game.

effects.name: zero-dat
effects.text: While Zero is playing a battle, other team dat kuskis improve all their PRs by 2 seconds.

effects.name: bene-dat
effects.text: Teammates playing a multi route level improve their PR by 4 seconds.

effects.name: finman-dat
effects.text: All playing team dat kuskis gain "Pipe pro -2".
effects.italicText: Decrease this kuski's PRs by 2 seconds on pipe levels.

effects.name: finman-dat-own
effects.text: If the ongoing battle was started by FinMan, all playing team dat kuskis gain "Pipe pro -4".

effects.name: pab-dat
effects.text: Pab can be put online at any moment while there is another teammate online under your control.

effects.name: soft-rage-quit
effects.text: Target kuski gains: "Whenever this kuski fails to improve it's PR during a battle turn, send it offline".

effects.name: vsync-level-abort
effects.text: Abort the ongoing battle. No one gets points from that battle and each player can choose to send their playing kuski online or offline.

effects.name: self-abort
effects.text: Abort an ongoing or queued level started by one of your kuskis. That kuski may add a new level to the queue. If the battle was ongoing, no one gets points from that battle and playing kuskis are sent offline.

effects.name: quick-abort
effects.text: Remove target level from the queue and add it to the bottom of it. This level is still owned by the kuski that added it in the first place.

effects.name: bad-luck-mopo
effects.text: Target kuski with at least one finish on the ongoing battle cannot improve that time anymore.

effects.name: shadow-record
effects.text: Target kuski with a PR on the ongoing battle makes a new PR equal to the next best time on the board.

effects.name: forced-play
effects.text: Choose an offline kuski from the game. If there is an ongoing battle, that kuski enters the battle.

effects.name: quick-steal
effects.text: Choose an offline kuski from the game. If there is an ongoing battle, that kuski enters the battle. The kuski's PRs count as if the kuski entered the battle on the first battle turn. When this battle ends, ban that kuski from the game.

effects.name: jonsta-effect
effects.text: Whenever Jonsta enters the game field, you may search for a puzzle or multi-route level and put it in your hand, then shuffle your library.

effects.name: barryp-effect
effects.text: When Barryp enters the game field, you may search your library for a pipe level and put it in your hand, then shuffle your library.

effects.name: jonsta-no-abort
effects.text: Levels started by Jonsta cannot be aborted.

effects.name: all-gain-watchful
effects.text: While this level is being battled, all your kuskis gain watchful.
effects.italicText: This kuski can enter a pre-announced battle while being offline.

effects.name: chain-level-3
effects.text: Chain level 3
effects.italicText: This level must be started by 3 or more kuskis.

effects.name: block-opponents-1
effects.text: Your opponent's kuskis cannot enter a battle in this level during it's first full turn.

effects.name: force-start-ban
effects.text: You may force any kuski from the game field to start this level as a battle. After this level is battled and discarded, ban that kuski from the game.

effects.name: chain-pi-effect
effects.text: When ChaiPi01 is added to the queue, search your library for a kuski with pipe pro and put it in your hand, then shuffle your library.

effects.name: apple
effects.text: Apple
effects.italicText: During battle, if a kuski were to improve its best time, add an apple counter to it instead. The kuski with more apples wins. When the battle ends, remove all apple counters from playing kuskis.

effects.name: finish-count
effects.text: Finish count
effects.italicText: During battle, if a kuski were to improve its best time, add a finish counter to it instead. The kuski with more finishes wins. When the battle ends, remove all finish counters from playing kuskis.

effects.name: one-life
effects.text: One life
effects.italicText: Kuskis can only enter this battle during the battle's first full turn. Kuski times are calculated as kuski's first finish plus 1 minute per full turn already battled. If all kuskis have finished and the battle is still ongoing, the battle ends on the next turn.

effects.name: multiplayer
effects.text: Multiplayer
effects.italicText: This level must be played by pairs of kuskis. The worse PR between both is the time that counts.

effects.name: slowness
effects.text: Slowness
effects.italicText: The kuski with the slowest time wins.

effects.name: prs-blocker-3
effects.text: Add 3 killer counters on target kuski.
effects.italicText: The next time this kuski will do a PR, it doesn't, remove a killer counter from it instead.

effects.name: unban
effects.text: Return target banned kuski to it's owner's hand.

effects.name: min-full-turns-2
effects.text: Kuskis must play at least 2 full turns before it first PR counts as finish.

effects.name: winner-extra-full-turns
effects.text: Winner gets 1 extra point for each full turn played on this battle.

effects.name: kuski-battle-quit-1
effects.text: You may remove one of your kuskis from this battle during your turn, and put it as offline.

effects.name: min-full-turns-1
effects.text: Kuskis must play at least 1 full turns before it first PR counts as finish.

effects.name: min-time-40
effects.text: Only times under 40 seconds count in the battle results.

effects.name: slowness-swap
effects.text: Choose target queued level or ongoing battle without apple, first finish, finish count or onelife, it gains slowness and loses it's other types
effects.italicText: The kuski with the slowest time wins.

effects.name: remove-battle-type-effects
effects.text: Remove all other battle type effects from the target level.
effects.italicText: Battle types are: apple, first finish, finish count, multiplayer, one life  and slowness

effects.name: ramone-effect
effects.text: When a battle started by Ramone finishes, you win 1 point for each battler that played it.

effects.name: pipe-pro-2
effects.text: Pipe Pro -2
effects.italicText: Decrease this kuski's PRs by 2 seconds on pipe levels.

effects.name: talli-effect
effects.text: When Talli enters the game field you win 1 point and your opponents loses 1 point.

effects.name: hosp-effect
effects.text: Designer's curse
effects.italicText: Whenever this kuski adds a level to the queue, you may choose another target kuski. When this battle starts, that kuski is sent offline and remains offline until the end of it.

effects.name: chris-enter
effects.text: When Chris enters the game field you may search your library for an apple level and put it in your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

effects.name: chirs-effect
effects.text: Whenever an apple battle starts you may put an apple counter to another kuski.

effects.name: enter-all
effects.text: This kuski enters every ongoing battle if it can.

effects.name: nobody-effect
effects.text: Whenever Nobody wins an after battle you get 1 point.
